```{r}
#upload the Test_data
library(readr)
Test_data <- read_delim("Test_data.csv", 
    delim = "\t", escape_double = FALSE, 
    col_types = cols(pvalue = col_number()), 
    locale = locale(decimal_mark = ","), 
    trim_ws = TRUE)
View(Test_data)
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
str(Test_data)
```

```{r}
summary(Test_data$pvalue )
```

```{r}
original_pvalues <- 10^(-Test_data$pvalue)
summary(original_pvalues)
```
